name: YTLite
subtitle: Unofficial source of YTLite
description: The unofficial AltStore source of the YouTube tweak, YTLite. YTLite is a flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundreds of customizable options.

apps.name: YTLite
apps.subtitle: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS
apps.localizedDescription: A flexible enhancer for YouTube on iOS, featuring over hundreds of customizable options.

versions.localizedDescription:
- This update is primarily focused on improving stability and fixing major and critical bugs.
- Introduced SponsorBlock Engine to handle sponsorblock api, sponsor segments and video interaction
- Added the ability to whitelist channels (SponsorBlock) and manage the list
- Added support for creating, saving, and editing private and public SponsorBlock UserIDs (more features coming soon)
- Reworked the player gesture toast, with a new compact mode
- Rewritten progress toast with support for swipe-to-dismiss gestures, also now used by SponsorBlock
- Added ability to open clipboard links (Long-press on the first tab → Open Link)
- Added an option to automatically check and open clipboard for any YouTube-related links (YTPlus Settings → Interface → Other)
- Fixed an issue where post images couldn’t be opened by tapping
- Fixed crashes while scrolling through the feed
- Fixed rare crashes during video playback
- Fixed crashes with Speed Controls in the player overlay
- Speed Controls interaction now resets the overlay auto-hide timer
- Fixed playback rate changing up to 5x, both, overlay controls and gestures
- Fixed issues related to hiding menu buttons
- Fixed overlay buttons not hiding correctly in Shorts
- Fixed tab bar issues
- Fixed minor bugs in the feed
- Improved gesture interaction within the player
- Fixed general overlay interaction issues
- Partially rewritten YTPlus settings for better stability and UX. Replaced oversized YT Sheets with compact menus, tapping a cell now shows a detailed alert
- Various minor internal code improvements and cleanups

- Completely rewritten downloader mechanism
- Added multi-download support
- Added video resumption (for now, you’ll need to disable automatic cache clearing and download video in the same quality)
- Added support for multiple toasts at the same time. You can rotate them by tapping on them
- Added the ability to hide the download progress with a long press on the "Stop" button
- Added the option to hide the "Create Remix" and "Listen to in YouTube Music" buttons in the video menu
- Added the ability to reorder videos in all sorting types of playlists (YouTube removed this feature)
- Added options to Save, Share and Copy image from Image viewer
- Now, a long press on the first tab of the tab bar opens Tab settings instead of showing/hiding the Library tab
- Fixed a bug that prevented hiding the Home tab
- Fixed a bug with the black Premium logo
- Fixed a bug with a black background in saved posts
- Fixed a bug where SponsorBlock notifications were not showing
- Fixed a bug with Shorts, removed new ads
- Removed even more ads
- Fixed remember loop
- Fixed captions and audio-tracks selection on newest YT versions
- Other minor fixes and improvements

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
